title: Valid Player Stats Request
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Facebook Messenger Bot
custom_steps:
WHEN the user makes a valid active player stat intent

i.e.
- judge
- aaron judge
- aaron judge home run
- has aaron judge hit a hr?
- how's aaron judge doing?
custom_expected: THEN the user is presented with a player stats card according to the game state

custom_steps_separated.content: When the player is playing in a live game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is presented with a live player stats card containing live stats

custom_steps_separated.content: When the player played in the last N days
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is presented with a player stats card

title: Valid Player Stats Request not Recognized by Bot
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Facebook Messenger Bot
custom_steps:
WHEN the user makes a valid active player stat intent
BUT is not recognized by the bot

i.e.
- judge
- aaron judge
- aaron judge home run
- has aaron judge hit a hr?
- how's aaron judge doing?
custom_expected:
THEN the user is presented with an error message:
Sorry I don't recognize that. You can ask me about scores, schedules, and players.

title: Invalid Player Stats Request
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Facebook Messenger Bot
custom_steps: WHEN the user makes an invalid active player stat intent
custom_expected:
THEN the user is presented with an error message:
I don't recognize that request. Try asking about a team.

title: Multiple Players w/Same Name
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Facebook Messenger Bot
custom_steps:
WHEN the user makes a valid active player stat intent
AND there are multiple players with the same name
custom_expected:
THEN the bot replies with:
Which PlayerName would you like to know about?

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is presented with a quick action button for all matches
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is able to tap on the desired player
